name: Firefox Translucent Dialogs for Mac
description: Adds vibrancy effect to dialog windows on OS X 10.10 and later.

user.name: The Cupcake Generator
user.about: Generating cupcakes and userstyles with love since 1673 ♥ Powered by busy critters and sleepy snails.

additional_info: UPDATES 2016/02/01 • Original release ADVICES Only works with OS X 10.10 or later, does not works with Windows and Linux-based systems. For Windows 7 users, this userstyle by Hj-kos provides a similar effect based on Aero Glass transparency effect to dialog windows: https://userstyles.org/styles/11707/glass-dialogs-firefox-3-1

discussions.name: Can you make one for the nav bar?
